title: Gerrymandering for Dummies
author: Sheila Ellison
summary: dividing of a state into election districts to give one political party a majority in many districts while concentrating the voting strength of the other party into as few districts as possible.

title: Virginia Gets Thumbs Down for Voting Rights
author: Research  Team
summary: Republicans made Virginia one of the hardest states in the union to vote: No early voting, Not enough polling places, Two-hour waits in some Black and Latino neighborhoods. And that’s only 3 of 7 roadblocks Republicans put in your way. More Info

title: Feeling Sick Yet?
author: Jilly Cooper
summary: Virginia Republicans repeatedly blocked expansion of Medicaid. They blocked the infusion of $2.2 billion in federal dollars into the Commonwealth’s economy, and the creation of over 15,000 jobs, making average salaries of $60K a year. And oh yeah: they denied 400,000 Virginians access to health insurance

title: Virginia Needs Criminal Justice Reform
author: Jane Addams
summary: Democrats are working to reform juvenile and criminal justice systems so they operate fairly and equitably
